@clareconway Heh. Nope, I'm part of the relationship management team, which means lots of deep dives into customer workflows. The dream TBH. ðŸ˜
@clareconway On the product side, or on the sales side? ðŸ˜‰
@clareconway @ProductCampDUB I'd love to have heard that! It's not always a healthy relationship but there's so much to be gained on both sides if the right expectations are set on both sides.
@clareconway I'd argue a good sales rep would recognise the fallacy of that approach when it comes to building a sustainable business. And a good product team would say no. ðŸ˜Š

The first half of this included a killer Radiohead reference and a 300-phone 'orchestra' performing an excerpt from Beethoven's 5th. One of the coolest things I've ever seen in Vicar Street ðŸ‘Œ https://t.co/2E41flXXxH

@CiaraLNorton I'm not gonna lie, bus has become my default the past 2 weeks. My day starts at 8am and the combo of darkness + increased traffic isn't appealing. Thought I'd get to Christmas at least but nope. ðŸ˜”
@CiaraLNorton Oh crikey. Hope you're okay, it's an awful shock at the best of times.
